CustomerController - Class in controller
Controller class which provides control logic for the various components of the Customers screen, including: adding, updating, selecting, and deleting customers; viewing all customers in a table that directly corresponds to the applicable customers table from the database (except that date/times are displayed in user's local time); and filtering table by ID or name.
